snippet: Artemis Racing will continue its challenge for the America’s Cup, although it will miss some early rounds of the trials as it recovers from the fatal capsizing of its first boat last month.
abstract: Artemis Racing will continue its challenge for America’s Cup, although it will miss some early rounds of trials as it recovers from fatal capsizing of its first boat.
lead_paragraph: Artemis Racing will continue its challenge for the America’s Cup, although it will miss some early rounds of the trials as it recovers from the fatal capsizing of its first boat last month.

headline.main: Artemis Racing Stays in America’s Cup
